body_html:
Possibly, though this will be pretty advanced and likely not work easily out of the box.

TLDR: TensorFlow Hub enables you to compose Hub Modules into a single model. If you can export/provide both models as Hub Modules, then you can later use the Hub APIs to import them into a single graph/model. You will still need to wire-up the inputs & outputs.

body:
Possibly, though this will be pretty advanced and likely not work easily out of the box.

TLDR: [TensorFlow Hub](https://www.tensorflow.org/hub/) enables you to compose Hub Modules into a single model. If you can export/provide both models as Hub Modules, then you can later use the Hub APIs to import them into a single graph/model. You will still need to wire-up the inputs & outputs.
